name: VoiceCommandModule
0:
”Alexa, ask voice command module head up”
”Alexa, ask voice command module head down”
”Alexa, ask voice command module leg up”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice command module
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is used for control the smart bed device of Customatic Technologies company,
you can control the smart bed device by the flow voice command:
1. "Alexa, ask voice command module head up"
2. "Alexa, ask voice command module head down"
3. "Alexa, ask voice command module foot up"
4. "Alexa, ask voice command module foot down"
5. "Alexa, ask voice command module leg up"
6. "Alexa, ask voice command module leg down"
7. "Alexa, ask voice command module lumbar up"
8. "Alexa, ask voice command module lumbar down"
9. "Alexa, ask voice command module stop"
10. "Alexa, ask voice command module flat"
11. "Alexa, ask voice command module antisnore"
12. "Alexa, ask voice command module lounge"
13. "Alexa, ask voice command module zero gravity"
14. "Alexa, ask voice command module incline"
15. "Alexa, ask voice command module lounge program"
16. "Alexa, ask voice command module zero gravity program"
17. "Alexa, ask voice command module incline program"
18. "Alexa, ask voice command module massage start"
19. "Alexa, ask voice command module wave one"
20. "Alexa, ask voice command module wave two"
21. "Alexa, ask voice command module wave three"
22. "Alexa, ask voice command module wave four"
23. "Alexa, ask voice command module full body one"
24. "Alexa, ask voice command module full body two"
25. "Alexa, ask voice command module massage up"
26. "Alexa, ask voice command module massage down"
27. "Alexa, ask voice command module massage stop"
28. "Alexa, ask voice command module light on"
29. "Alexa, ask voice command module lights on"
30. "Alexa, ask voice command module light off"
31. "Alexa, ask voice command module lights off"
32. "Alexa, ask voice command module toggle light"
33. "Alexa, ask voice command module toggle lights"
34. "Alexa, ask voice command module feedback on"
35. "Alexa, ask voice command module feedback off"
